product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies Micro Survival Kit
long_description: Keep the essentials close at hand during backcountry adventures. The Ultimate Survival Technologies MIcro Survival Kit contains a collection of vital supplies in a compact, easy to pack kit. Kit includes a waterproof storage bag, button compass, Sabercut Razor Saw, Pico Lite 1.0 mini flashlight, Jetscream Micro emergency whistle, Starflash micro signaling mirror. Also includes Spark Force Firestarter and 2 Wetfire Tinder cubes. Ultimate Survival Technologies Micro Survival Kits measures 5 x 4 in.
short_description: Keep the essentials close at hand during backcountry adventures. The Ultimate Survival Technologies MIcro Survival Kit contains a collection of vital supplies in a compact, easy to pack kit.
